name: webpack-sources
description: Source code handling classes for webpack
author: Tobias Koppers @sokra

scripts.lint: npm run lint:code && npm run lint:types && npm run lint:types-test && npm run lint:special
scripts.lint:special: node node_modules/tooling/inherit-types && node node_modules/tooling/format-file-header && node node_modules/tooling/generate-types
scripts.fix: npm run fix:code && npm run fix:special
scripts.fix:special: node node_modules/tooling/inherit-types --write && node node_modules/tooling/format-file-header --write && node node_modules/tooling/generate-types --write
